A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi is fun to watch. It has some great visuals\, and the most important characters deliver excellent performances. There is admittedly some poorly-used time with the subplots\, but they don't make the movie "awful"\, by any stretch. It's also not a five-star movie\, so don't go expecting to see the sci-fi version of the Godfather. 

That's probably the point\, here: the lower audience score is attributable to sky-high expectations from passionate fans that weren't met. 

Long story short\, it's worth watching.
